latest_articles.title: Winter Olympics, spread across north Italy, open with Milanese flair
latest_articles.summary: The Opening Ceremonies of the 2026 Winter Olympics featured four simultaneous events in four locations marking what organizers said was the most spread-out Games in history.

latest_articles.title: Milan Athletes Welcome Return of Winter Olympics Spectators

latest_articles.title: Naturally, Italy’s Song for the Olympics Is About Love
latest_articles.summary: The 1977 classic “Ti Amo” was so popular that it was recorded in several languages. Now, it takes a spin as the official song for the 2026 Winter Olympics.
